<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

				<article class="partners custom-small-hidden">

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

					<div class="grid-2">

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

				
			</aside>
		</footer>
	</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

                    jQuery(document).ready(function() {

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

    <p class="information_text"><a href="//www.leboncoin.fr/popup_collecte_donnees_conseiller.htm
" onclick="return cnilPopup(this, 700, 300);">- Le responsable de traitement, les destinataires et la finalit&eacute; de la collecte des donn&eacute;es.</a><br>
    <a href="//www.leboncoin.fr/popup_droits_opposition.htm" onclick="return cnilPopup(this, 700, 300);">- Vos droits d'opposition, d'acc&egrave;s et de rectification sur vos donn&eacute;es collect&eacute;es.</a></p>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

                    jQuery(document).ready(function() {

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

					<input type="submit" value="Envoyer" class="button-blue" data-info='{"event_name" : "ad_view::partage::email_ami::confirmation", "event_type" : "load", "event_s2" : "2"}'>
				</form>

    <p class="information_title">Information : </p>
    <p class="information_text"><a href="//www.leboncoin.fr/popup_collecte_donnees_conseiller.htm
" onclick="return cnilPopup(this, 700, 300);">- Le responsable de traitement, les destinataires et la finalit&eacute; de la collecte des donn&eacute;es.</a><br>
    <a href="//www.leboncoin.fr/popup_droits_opposition.htm" onclick="return cnilPopup(this, 700, 300);">- Vos droits d'opposition, d'acc&egrave;s et de rectification sur vos donn&eacute;es collect&eacute;es.</a></p>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

" onclick="return cnilPopup(this, 700, 300);">- Le responsable de traitement, les destinataires et la finalit&eacute; de la collecte des donn&eacute;es.</a><br>
    <a href="//www.leboncoin.fr/popup_droits_opposition.htm" onclick="return cnilPopup(this, 700, 300);">- Vos droits d'opposition, d'acc&egrave;s et de rectification sur vos donn&eacute;es collect&eacute;es.</a></p>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

				
			</aside>
		</footer>
	</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function cnilPopup(link, width, height) {
	    var left = window.screenX + (screen.width / 2) - (width / 2);
	    var top = (screen.height / 2) - (height / 2);
	    var windowFeatures = "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left=" + left + ",top=" + top + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,location=no,directories=no";
	    u=link.href;
	    t=document.title;
	    window.open(u,'InfosCNIL', windowFeatures);
	    return false;
	}
</script>
